projects.title: Mentor
projects.bodyText: The ‚ÄúMentor Website for Online Course Enrollment‚Äù is an online platform built with Python, Django, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap. It connects learners with experienced mentors, offering a variety of courses. The platform features a secure payment gateway for hassle-free transactions, providing a seamless learning experience. üòä

projects.title: Petshop E-Commerce Plateform
projects.bodyText: Explore the Pet Product Shopping E-Commerce Application, a one-stop solution for all pet-related needs. Built with Python, Django, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, this platform offers a wide range of pet products and a seamless shopping experience with integrated payment gateways.üòä

projects.title: Nutricare
projects.bodyText: NutriCare: A user-friendly website built with HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, showcasing modern web design principles.üòä

projects.title: Face Detection Counter for Pandemic Situation
projects.bodyText: The Face Detection Counter is a real-time tool that uses live camera feeds and images to detect and count faces. If more than five faces are detected, it displays a 'PLEASE MAINTAIN SOCIAL DISTANCING' message, promoting safety during the pandemic. üòä
